record.description: First steps are taken for the construction of a $3,000,000 student residence hall for undergraduates at Greenwood and Ellis Avenues, University of Chicago campus, the first to be built south of the Midway. Above (left to right) Dean W. A. Pomeroy, Dr. J. Spencer Dickerson, Professor Jerome Kerwin, N. W. Levin, Professor Einar Joranson, Raymond S. Rubinow, Charles Miller, Roy W. Bixler, Dean Aaron Brumbaugh, Charleton Beck, Professor Bertram Nelson, Amos Alonzo Stagg, and Emery Filbey (with shovel).
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Small piece of the photo has torn or broken off from the bottom. Some emulsification or shading on some figures and trees in the photo.
